languages.text: "Воля ваша". {n}Бригадир протягивает миску тягучей горячей жижи. Запах... не такой уж и плохой... каким мог бы быть.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Воля ваша". {n}Бригадир протягивает миску тягучей горячей жижи. Запах... не такой уж и плохой... каким мог бы быть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot viscous sludge. The smell... isn't as bad... as it could be.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot viscous sludge. The smell... isn't as bad... as it could be.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... isn't as bad as you expected.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... isn't as bad as you expected.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}
"As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

languages.text: «Como desee». {n}El Capataz te entrega un bol de fango caliente y viscoso. Su olor... podría ser peor... seguramente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como desee». {n}El Capataz te entrega un bol de fango caliente y viscoso. Su olor... podría ser peor... seguramente.{/n}

languages.text: 「仰せのままに」{n}作業長が熱くて粘性のあるドロドロのボウルを渡してくる。臭いは…もっとひどい気がする…たぶんだが。{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに」{n}作業長が熱くて粘性のあるドロドロのボウルを渡してくる。臭いは…もっとひどい気がする…たぶんだが。{/n}

languages.text: “如您所愿。”{n}工头递给你一晚黏糊糊、热腾腾的烂泥，它的味道……说不定比烂泥还让人恶心……{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿。”{n}工头递给你一晚黏糊糊、热腾腾的烂泥，它的味道……说不定比烂泥还让人恶心……{/n}

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Der Vorarbeiter reicht dir eine Schüssel mit heißem, dickflüssigem Schleim. Der Geruch ... könnte schlimmer sein ... vermutlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Der Vorarbeiter reicht dir eine Schüssel mit heißem, dickflüssigem Schleim. Der Geruch ... könnte schlimmer sein ... vermutlich.{/n}

languages.text: « Comme vous voudrez. » {n}Le contremaître vous tend un bol chaud de bouillie visqueuse. L'odeur... pourrait être pire... sans doute.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voudrez. » {n}Le contremaître vous tend un bol chaud de bouillie visqueuse. L'odeur... pourrait être pire... sans doute.{/n}

languages.text: "Başüstüne." {n}Ustabaşı, sana sıcak ve yoğun tortudan bir kâse uzatıyor. Kokusu... Çok daha kötü olabilirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}The Foreman hands you a bowl of hot, viscous sludge. The smell... could be worse... probably.{/n}
